main_definition: A brief or temporary recording of a moment in time, often used to describe an image captured by a camera.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An instant photograph taken using a camera
meanings_and_examples.example: She clicked the shutter button and took a snapshot of her friend's excited face.
After reading the report, he gave us a quick snapshot of its main findings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abrupt and sudden understanding or realization
meanings_and_examples.example: When she saw her old friend after many years, it was as if everything suddenly snapped into focus for her.
